snippet: Members of the cast and crew took part in a question-and-answer session with an excited audience at Comic-Con International, but they revealed almost nothing about next season.
abstract: Members of the cast and crew took part in a question-and-answer session with an excited audience at Comic-Con International, but they revealed almost nothing about next season.

headline.main: Crowd Asks for More on ‘Game of Thrones,’ but Cast Says No
